initial.label: Current Outlook
initial.description: Given current commitments, this is what corporate emissions will look like from now until 2050.

action.label: Climate-Aligned Action
action.description: If all of these companies follow guidance IPCC guidance for 1.5C aligned emissions, this is what emissions will look like from now until 2050.

hard-catches.label: Herd catches leaders
hard-catches.description: If companies that have average commitments increase their climate ambition to meet leaders, this is what emissions will look like from now until 2050.

laggards-catch.label: Laggards catch herd
laggards-catch.description: If companies with unambitious or no commitments increase their climate ambition to meet the herd, this is what emissions will look like from now until 2050.

no-action.label: No further action
no-action.description: If companies do not take further action to curb their emissions, this is what emissions will look like from now until 2050.
